name: Marty Thinks 4D
description: Marty Thinks 4D is an isometric 3D puzzle platformer where you play as a small robot on a journey to find his creator. With the aid of time travel, Marty is able to step into the past and work together with past versions of himself to overcome any challenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.7 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 1020 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.7 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 1020 MB available space
